name: TempoSDK
description: iOS library for indoor mapping using GeoJSON.

script_phases.name: CartoMobileSDK
script_phases.script:
CARTOMOBILESDK_DIR="${PROJECT_DIR}/TempoSDK/Frameworks/CartoMobileSDK"
				if [ -f "${CARTOMOBILESDK_DIR}/module.modulemap" ]
				then
				echo "CartoMobileSDK already exists, skipping"
				else
				FRAMEWORK_DIR="${BUILT_PRODUCTS_DIR}/Frameworks/CartoMobileSDK.framework"
				if [ -d "${FRAMEWORK_DIR}" ]; then
				echo "${FRAMEWORK_DIR} already exists, so skipping the rest of the script."
				exit 0
				fi
				mkdir -p "${FRAMEWORK_DIR}/Modules"
				echo "module CartoMobileSDK [system] {
				header \"${PROJECT_DIR}/TempoSDK/Frameworks/CartoMobileSDK.framework/Versions/A/Headers/CartoMobileSDK.h\"
				export *
				}" >> "${FRAMEWORK_DIR}/Frameworks/Modules/module.modulemap"
				ln -sf "${PROJECT_DIR}/TempoSDK/Frameworks/CartoMobileSDK" "${FRAMEWORK_DIR}/Headers"
				fi
